title: 5-DAY DIGITAL FILMMAKING WORKSHOP DEC. 12 - 16
desc: "Independent filmmaking doesn't have to look CHEAP, and professional filmmaking doesn't have to be EXPENSIVE." -? ERIC LAU 5-DAY DIGITAL FILMMAKING WORKSHOP ?December 12 - 16 This? 5-day intensive, hands-on workshop ?takes students through every stage of filmmaking ( Script Writing, Producing, Directing, Camera, Lighting, Sound Mixing & Editing ) with creative techniques that are? easy-to-learn ?and? practical-to-use ?to complete a film in 5 days. WHEN:? Dec. 12 - 16 (Sat-Wed) 9.30am - 5:30pm WHO: Narrative/Documentary Filmmakers FEE: $1050 General Registration Join us! LIMITED SEATING Info: ? http://solarnyc.com/digitalfilmmakingworkshop WATCH ?the 3-min Thriller and other videos by Workshop Participants:? http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xss6AhFgMP8&lr=1 Solar Film/Video Productions 632 Broadway, Ste. 304 New York, NY 10012 212?473?3040 W 212?473?3091 F solarvideofilm@gmail.com www.solarnyc.com/digitalfilmmakingworkshop
